title: 張超雄賣港實錄Lawmaker Fernando Cheung vs HK.By Chapman Chen

replies.msg:
張超雄面書昨日提出用長者組成人鏈，保護警察，令抗爭者投鼠忌器，不敢勇武行動，結果被克警打死。同日張超雄又提交逃犯引渡條例私人草案修訂，幫惡法起死回生，尚話要趕在十月通過。即是想引渡走去臺灣的香港政治犯回港受刑。今年七一，張超雄用身擋住立法會大門，阻止抗爭者衝擊，但被其推開。一五年五月，律政司確認控方會傳召十四名控方證人，包括立法會議員張超雄，指證一四年十一月十九日衝擊立法會的後生。當日，張超雄用身阻擋抗爭者衝擊立法會大門成功。一五年灣仔十一升旗禮，工黨等人攪的糾察隊組成人鏈，在警察防線前大叫「保護警察！」
What Hong Kong Lawmaker Fernando Cheung has Done to HK Resistance張超雄如何反抗爭. By Chapman Chen, HKBNews
On 1019-7-17, Hong Kong lawmaker Fernando Cheung 張超雄 (Labour Party) proposed a private draft of amendment to Fugitive Offenders Bill (Extradition Law) when the Chief Executive Carrie Lam had already declared the Bill dead. Cheung claimed that this draft will enable HK to exchange fugitives with regions outside of Mainland China or Macau, that it is already certified by the Department of Justice and will be submitted to the Legco Chair. This draft, if enacted, may make it possible for the Communist HK Govt to transfer HK political prisoners from Taiwan back to HK. On the same day, a facebook post of Cheung's (later deleted) suggested that old civilians be organized in future protests to form a human-flesh chain between the police and the young activists, allegedly in order to protect both and prevent violence, despite the fact that in recent protests like the June 12 protest in Admiralty, the July 13 rally in Sheung Shui, the July 14 rally in Shatin, the police indiscriminately hit unarmed people of all ages with baton, pepper spray, rubber bullet, tear gas.

Besides the above, Fernando Cheung has done many other things that are arguably against Hong Kong resistance against Communist China.

In May 2015, the Department of Justice confirmed that Fernando Cheung was on the prosecution witnesses' list against defendants related to the 2014-11-19 storming of the Legco. On that day, he covered the main entrance to the Legco with his own body and successfully prevented activists from breaking it. On 2019-7-1, Cheung again tried to cover the main entrance to the Legco with his body in order to prevent activists from storming it. But this time, the activists simply pushed him aside and managed to break in. Many Hong Kong netizens wonder what would happen to someone who tried to defend the main gate of the Bastille Prison when the angry revolutionaries were storming it in the 1789 French Revolution.

On 2015-10-1, during the National Flag Raising ceremony in Wan Chai, members of Fernando Cheung's Labour Party, and other pseudo-leftists formed a human-flesh-chain in front of the police, and loudly shouted" Protect the police!" who were in fact heavily armed in contrast with the young unarmed protesters. (This was eye-witnessed by Chapman Chen from HKBNews.)

Pic credit: Appledaily

FB link: https://www.facebook.com/hongkongbilingualnews/posts/732449810526119?__tn__=-R-R

#fernandocheung #hongkongextraditionlaw #extraditionlaw #frenchrevolution #ccp #communistchina #mole #maga2020 #keepamericagreat #chapmanchen #hkbnews #cheungchiuhung #張超雄 #hongkongtraitors #hongkongresistance

replies.msg:
行政長官林鄭月娥宣布政府修訂《逃犯條例》「壽終正寢」，工黨立法會議員張超雄提交修訂《逃犯條例》私人草案。

張超雄表示，他提出修訂，讓香港可以與大陸或澳門以外的地方互交逃犯，已取得律政司法律草擬專員發出的證明書，並提交予立法會主席。

張超雄指，台灣殺人案的疑犯陳同佳將於十月獲釋，如要等立法會復會才審議草案，最快要十月第二個星期。他認為自己的草案內容相對簡單，希望主席召開特別會議處理，有望在陳同佳獲釋前完成修訂。

replies.msg:
協紀辨方
販民這班人，你看漏他們一眼，他們就會急不及待將你賣掉。

張超雄這個賣港賊，又在幫林鄭解圍了。林鄭已經講壽終正寢，這個人還要提交私人草案，趕在十月放上立法會通過。

你會話，張超雄提議的是一次性的引渡，而且只是跟台灣引渡，同反對引渡返中國衝突呀？

如果你有這種想法，證明你很天真很傻。

香港的法律制度是普通法，是根據先例原則判案。因此，每行第一步都要非常小心，因為一旦開錯先例，就要花大量人力物力去糾正。

香港與中華地區包括台灣，向來沒有引渡條款，是因為法制上的不同，台灣行的也是大陸法系。如果將台灣列入引渡國之一，咁你又有咩理由抗拒同中國簽同樣的協議呢？你只能純粹從政治原因去反對，而不是法理上的原因，這樣非常危險。若然香港跟台灣有引渡法，就不能以法系不同為由拒絕中國。

再者，港共緊跟中共立場，不承認台灣是一個獨立的法律實體。若跟台灣開了引渡先例，港共可以振振有辭，基於一個中國原則，既然引渡適用於台灣，而台灣是中國一部分，因此同樣適用於大陸。

至於所謂一次性，你真係信？先例一開，港共就可以大大聲話有先例在先，引渡有何不可？這是置於台灣流亡的義士於險地。還有你今日可以同台灣一次性引渡，他日港共亦可以同樣理由，一次性將疑犯送去中國。

若果你話現在台灣是民進黨執政，蔡英文唔會咁做。咁若果有日政治形勢丕變，台灣換成韓國瑜上台呢？

replies.msg:
Is Lawmaker Fernando Cheung 張超雄Reviving Hong Kong Extradition Law? By Chapman Chen
On 2019-7-17, Hong Kong lawmaker Fernando Cheung 張超雄 (Labour Party) proposed a private draft of amendment to Fugitive Offenders Bill (Extradition Law) when the Chief Executive Carrie Lam had already declared the Bill dead. Cheung claimed that this draft will enable HK to exchange fugitives with regions outside of Mainland China or Macau, that it is already certified by the Department of Justice and will be submitted to the Legco Chair. Although Cheung today (July 18) asserted that the extradition will be an one-off thing and an one-way ticket from HK to Taiwan, many Hongkongers are still deeply concerned. This is because the Hong Kong legal system practices Common Law, which recognizes precedents as authorities for the disposition of future cases (cf. Hip-ban-gei-fong/Midnight Express, 2019). If the precedent of extradition regarding Taiwan is set, the Communist Hong Kong Government will argue that, based on the principle of one China, since the extradition law is applicable to Taiwan, it should also be applicable to Communist China. Furthermore, both Taiwan and China practice some sort of continental law; if Taiwan is accepted in terms of extradition, why not China?
FB link: https://www.facebook.com/hongkongbilingualnews/posts/732449810526119?__tn__=-R-R
